title: Stream takeWhile / dropWhile
summary: Take or drop elements from a stream based on a predicate.
explanation: takeWhile() returns elements while the predicate is true and stops at the first false. dropWhile() skips elements while true and returns the rest. Both work best on ordered streams.

whyModernWins.title: Short-circuit
whyModernWins.desc: Stops processing as soon as the predicate fails.

whyModernWins.title: Pipeline-friendly
whyModernWins.desc: Chain with other stream operations naturally.

whyModernWins.title: Declarative
whyModernWins.desc: takeWhile reads like English: 'take while less than 100'.
